Name: Asian Riddles 2
About the game: Solve the riddles of the great Asian wise men again! Prove you are a truly master of griddlers! Much more unique levels! 144 riddles and 12 halls for meditation! More than 10 hours of gameplay to relaxing asian melodies. Charming world of Asia is waiting its hero again! - The game in the genre of griddlers - 144 unique levels - More than 10 hours of gameplay - Relaxing Asian music - Unique painting style
